mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NO, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_BIRTHDAY, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADDR, MEM_SMS_FL, MEM_TYPE, MEM_STATUS, MEM_STATUS_DATE, MEM_PROFILE_PATH, MEM_GRADE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 1 AND MEM_STATUS_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -#{deleteTargetPeriod} DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_PROFILE_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_PROFILE_PATH IS NOT NULL
